content:
The two checkmarks you see when editing the name of a topic in the message header bar are a bit confusing. Should we disable the "resolve topic" button during topic editing, perhaps?

Screen-Shot-2023-03-27-at-8.16.20-AM.png
(I guess we should also add tooltips to the checkmark and x.)

I think probably hiding all the other UI elements in the topic area while editing the topic is probably the best approach. If you're in the middle of changing the topic, it doesn't really make sense to do random other operations on that topic.
I filed Hide buttons in message header bar while editing topic #24888.
Himanshu Suryawanshi has marked this topic as resolved.
